library.name: ImageResources
library.description: Library for loading and managing image resources.

class.name: ImageLoader
class.description: Loads a single image from the project's resources into an ImageResource.

function.name: loadFromResources
function.description: Loads an image from the project resources and returns it as a new image instance.
function.arg: Filename of the image resource to load (relative to the project root)

function.name: loadFromResourcesAsync
function.description: Starts loading an image from the project resources and returns a new ImageLoader instance. Loading continues in the background asynchronously.
function.arg: Filename of the image resource to load (relative to the project root)

function.name: isDone
function.description: Returns true if the asynchronous image loading is done. Once true, it is safe to call getImage().

function.name: getImage
function.description: Returns the ImageResource instance once loading is done. If loading is not done, an error is generated.

function.name: getWidth
function.description: Returns the pixel width of the image.

function.name: getHeight
function.description: Returns the pixel height of the image.

class.name: ImageSheet
class.description: Represents (and manages the loading of) a batch of images. ImageSheet aggregation behavior is defined in the build file.

function.name: loadFromResources
function.description: Creates a new ImageSheet instance from the given image sheet name (or a list of image sheet names). Loading occurs synchronously.
function.arg: A name or list of names of image sheets. Image sheets are defined in the build file.

function.name: loadFromResourcesAsync
function.description: Same behavior as loadFromResources but performs loading asynchronously in the background. Use isDone and getProgress to monitor loading progress.
function.arg: A name or list of names of image sheets. Image sheets are defined in the build file.

function.name: isDone
function.description: Returns a boolean. True if the image sheet is done loading.

function.name: getProgress
function.description: Returns a ratio of progress (from 0 to 1) of how much of this image sheet has been loaded.

function.name: getImage
function.description: Returns an ImageResource for the given image path.
function.arg: Path to the image resource (relative to the project root).

function.name: getFiles
function.description: Returns a list of files that are contained in this image sheet.
